Version 2.0.92 - Fix Resume Format for iSpring/Rise 360 + Storyline Retry Backing Store Correction

Bug Fixes

  • Fix iSpring/Rise 360 resume going to slide 0: lesson_location boost now preserves vendor text format (e.g. "slide_3" not "3", "section_2" not "3")
  • Fix Rise 360 position bar off-by-one: parseSlideNumber now handles 0-based section_ prefix (section_0=1, section_1=2)
  • Fix Storyline resume going to previous slide: retry loop now corrects backing store when computing furthestSlide after LMSInitialize
  • Fix position bar dropping to 1/N during tag navigation: extend vendor poller suppression to cover tag navigation intercept window
  • Add formatLocationValue helper for format-aware lesson_location boost across all write paths
  • Replace remaining parseInt with parseSlideNumber in resume read interceptors, proactive writes, and LMSInitialize wrappers
  • Persist furthestSlide to localStorage/sessionStorage from retry loop (was missing)

Previous Versions

  • v2.0.91: Fix Storyline resume + remaining parseInt issues for iSpring/Rise 360
  • v2.0.90: Fix position bar counter for iSpring/Rise 360 (parseSlideNumber in step 6A) and Captivate (isApiWrite bypass)
  • v2.0.89: Refactor SCORM logs: remove ~300 verbose logs, add 12 targeted position-tracking logs
  • v2.0.88: Fix stale localStorage causing wrong position counter
